ca.concordia.game.model

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.game.model.Area

  • public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Area contains the possible object that could be available to an area.
    Author:
    Pascal,Gustavo,bhavik,Esteban,Diego

      • addTroubleMarker

        public boolean addTroubleMarker()
        Add troubleMarker to area if possible(Only one trouble marker is allowed per area). Return true if successful else return false.
        Returns:

      • addRemoveDemon

        public java.lang.String addRemoveDemon(int addRemove)
        Add or remove demon to area. If the argument is 1 then it will add a demon else if it is 2 it will remove a demon if possible. Will return a string with the status.
        Parameters:
        addRemove -
        Returns:

      • addRemoveTroll

        public java.lang.String addRemoveTroll(int addRemove)
        Add or remove troll to area. If the argument is 1 then it will add a troll else if it is 2 it will remove a troll if possible. Will return a string with the status.
        Parameters:
        addRemove -
        Returns:
